msbt.message: I do enjoy hosting at my house, I must say. It's such a relaxing way to get to know someone!
My schedule keeps me moving, so it's nice to get a little time at home to unwind like this.
You can't just throw a bunch of random furniture together and call it a style, you know. Even I made a few ill-advised decor choices in my youth, I must admit
Some people might disagree, but I think wallpaper is back in style. I say we paper all the walls!
You can't choose your family, but you can choose your furniture. And really, that's most important.
Wowâ€”with both of you here, it's almost like an impromptu party! I'm happy to host, of course.
Relax and make yourselves at home, . The more the merrier! To a point, of course.
Well, two visitors at the same time! I'd say I'm overwhelmed, but that would just be false modesty.
Let's all just let our hair down and get wild, shall we? Don't even bother using coasters, I say!
Oh, time flies when you're having friends over, doesn't it?
I'd love to host a never-ending party with friends just showing up as they pleased, night or day. Something would have to be done about the housekeeping, however
